rows.label: qst103405_msg0001
rows.name: Me? There's no problem in particular...

rows.label: qst103405_msg0002
rows.name:
I was attacked by a large number
of soldiers... and they threatened
to harm me as well?

rows.label: qst103405_msg0003
rows.name:
There has been no harm done here. As
long as I am in the Imperial Palace, no
one would be foolish enough to attack.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0004
rows.name:
I have brought my son to
the palace as well and have
assigned him a guard.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0005
rows.name:
More importantly, I am concerned that the
number of enemies was completely different
from the information I received.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0006
rows.name:
Was the information about a
small group false, or are our
movements being read...?

rows.label: qst103405_msg0007
rows.name:
The Blade named Akatsuki
who is giving the orders...
he may be a skilled one.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0009
rows.name:
In any case, I apologize for making
you fight an unnecessary battle.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0010
rows.name:
Just a moment ago, I received
information about the whereabouts
of the Brionac leaders.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0011
rows.name:
Leaders... which means there
is a possibility Akatsuki's
Driver is among them.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0012
rows.name:
This is a perfect opportunity
to neutralize Akatsuki, but
it might be another trap...

rows.label: qst103405_msg0013
rows.name:
Your reassuring words
are much appreciated.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0014
rows.name: The leaders' location is...

rows.label: qst103405_msg0015
rows.name:
On the roof of a building in
the Ayvill Shopping District,
there is a man named Wagan.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0016
rows.name:
On the roof of the Old Industrial
District, there is a man who
calls himself Vihank.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0017
rows.name:
Near the giant tank by the Cargo
Transportation Zone is Arodha.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0018
rows.name:
The information states that the leaders
will be conducting a transaction of
goods at these three locations.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0019
rows.name: Please be very careful...

rows.label: qst103405_msg0101
rows.name:
Even if Akatsuki is a skilled
Blade, we can neutralize him
by defeating his Driver.

rows.label: qst103405_msg0102
rows.name:
The anti-imperialist organization
Brionac... This time, let's
crush them for good.
